required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Changes of Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter Between Obese and Non-obese Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Gynecological Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: Optic Nerve Sheath Diameter Between Obese and Non-obese Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Gynecological Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to compare the change of optic nerve sheath diameter in obese and non-obese patients undergoing laparoscopic gynecological surgery in a steep Trendelenburg position.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes after pneuroperitoneum in the Trendelenburg position
primary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes after pneuroperitoneum in the Trendelenburg position
secondary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 60 minutes after pneuroperitoneum in the Trendelenburg position
secondary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes after release of pneumoperitoneum and return to the supine position
secondary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At 1 hour after completion of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At 24 hours after completion of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At 24 hours after completion of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The presence and severity of nausea and vomiting is evaluated.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At 24 hours after completion of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: The presence and severity of headache is evaluated.

intervention.intervention_name: Ultrasound assessment of optic nerve sheath diameter
intervention.description: Using ultrasonography, optic nerve sheath diameter is measured during perioperative period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing laparoscopic gynecological surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- Ophthalmic diseases
- Previous history of ophthalmic surgery.
- Neurological disorders
- History of head surgery.
